New Records: Cleveland's 14-game winning streak is the longest in the club's 55-year existence
Cleveland set a franchise record for points in a quarter with 49 in the first
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell opened the fourth quarter with a 3-pointer and scored Cleveland's first nine points of the period
Mitchell had 18 in the last 12 minutes
LeVert and Mitchell dropped 3-pointers as the Cavs blitzed the Bulls 21-7 the rest of the way
Post-Match Reflections: They're playing with energy and a connectivity that's only building their confidence and trust in Atkinson, who inherited a great situation and is only making it better
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland played without starting forward Evan Mobley, who has been battling an illness the past few days
